main event: A bright, balloon-like UFO was reported over Colorado Springs, Colorado on May 29, 1955.
interesting points: The UFO was reported directly to the Duty Officer at the 4602d AISS (Air Intelligence Service Squadron).
Other personnel also sighted the object, describing it as a large, white balloon-like shape.
Lowry AFB had released three 'Moby Dick' balloons on the same day, and one was plotted to be over Colorado Springs.
The sighting lasted for 0310 hours (approximately 31 minutes).
No further report was found in the file.
